title: News24.com | Coronavirus: Police Minister Cele pays tribute to officers on lockdown front line
description: It was to be expected that police officers, who are at the frontline of dealing with the Covid-19 pandemic, would start testing positive for the virus, Police Minister Bheki Cele has said, as he thanked them for their work during the lockdown.
content:
It was to
be expected that police officers, who are at the frontline of dealing with the
Covid-19 pandemic, would start testing positive for the virus, Police Minister
Bheki Cele said on Sunday, as he thanked them for their work during the
